text: Janet Jackson has confirmed a rumored split with her husband and says she plans to resume the world tour she called off more than a year ago during her pregnancy with her son. Jackson says in a video posted on Twitter that she has separated from husband Wissam Al Mana. She says, ` ` We are in court and the rest is in God's hands.'' The couple's son was born in January. FILE - In this June 28, 2015, file photo, Janet Jackson accepts the ultimate icon : music dance visual award at the BET Awards in Los Angeles. In a video posted on her Twitter account May 1, 2017, Jackson confirmed a rumored split with her husband and says plans to resume the world tour she called off more than a year ago during her pregnancy with her son, who was born in
